english.segment1: I just want to thank You. For finding me. And how could I forget You. And all You've done for me
english.segment2: I gave You a stone. And You gave me a heart. Now I'm Yours
english.segment3: CHORUS. I gave You a tear. You gave me a song. And now I know what life is. I asked You for silver. And You gave me gold. And now I know what life is
english.segment4: I just want to thank You. For trusting me. For standing right beside me. And believing in me
english.segment5: I don't need fortune. I don't need fame. I just need You
english.segment7: And now I know what life is. And now I know what life is. And now I know what life is. And now I know what life is
